dashboard.alt: Picture showing on how the dashboard works
dashboard.description: Effortlessly navigate the dashboard and get an overview of the current state of matches, students, supervisors, open positions, and much more...
dashboard.title: Navigate the Dashboard

download.description: Easily download all the confirmed matches. This gives you a one click overview of who is already matched and who's missing
download.title: Download match data

profile.description: Edit your profile by changing your name or picture. Keep in mind, you will be the only one to see this, to just do it for your personal satisfaction.
profile.title: Edit your profile

upload.description: Easily upload all the supervisors and tags. Supervisors data gets overwritten when you upload a new list.
upload.title: Upload new data

dashboard.alt: Picture showing on how the dashboard works
dashboard.description: Effortlessly navigate the dashboard and get an overview of your current state of open requests and manage your supervised students
dashboard.title: Navigate the Dashboard

manage.alt: A video showcasing how to remove students you have matched with
manage.description: Remove students you have matched with, or add new ones, if you will be supervising them!
manage.title: Manage you Students

matching.alt: A video showcasing the use of the matching page
matching.description: Swipe left or right to accept or reject supervision requests from Students. Visit their profile, and undo your actions if you mis-swiped!
matching.title: Match with Supervisors

overview.alt: A video giving an overview of the app
overview.description: Now that you know the basics, jump right in and start supervising students!
overview.title: Get started using the app

profile.alt: A video showcasing how to use the profile
profile.description: You can edit your tags and descriptions. People who visit your profile, are able to see this data!
profile.title: View and edit your profile

dashboard.description: Effortlessly navigate the dashboard and get an overview of your current state in the request progress, matches, and much more...
dashboard.title: Navigate the Dashboard

matching.alt: A video showcasing the use of the matching page
matching.description: Swipe left or right to match with your perfect supervisor or dismiss unwanted ones. You can see your compatability with them, visit their profile, and undo your actions if you mis-swiped!
matching.title: Match with Supervisors

overview.alt: A video giving an overview of the app
overview.description: Now that you know the basics, jump right in and start matching with supervisors!
overview.title: Get started using the app

profile.alt: A video showcasing how to use the profile
profile.description: You can edit your name, tags and descriptions. People who visit your profile, are able to see this data!
profile.title: View and edit your profile

confirmed.noStudents: You have no students confirmed yet...

student.multipleAcceptedWarning: You accepted {count} supervision requests, but you only need one supervisor. Please talk to {supervisors} and resolve the conflict.

admin.changesAndOverwritesText: When you update your personal data, such as your name or profile picture, the previous version is permanently overwritten. We do not retain copies or backups of your previous personal data.
admin.collectedDataList:
Full name
Email address
Profile picture
admin.collectedDataText: For admin accounts, we only collect and store:
admin.dataDeletionText: When an admin deletes their account all personally identifiable data (name, email, and profile picture) will be permanently deleted without backup.
admin.dataRetentionList:
Tags added to the system
Supervisor accounts and associated metadata
Platform configurations or any structural input made during administrative use
admin.dataRetentionSubtitle: üìÅ What Is Retained After Admin Account Deletion

dataRetentionText.1: When an Admin deletes their account, all personal data (name, email, and profile picture) will be permanently removed. However, some data created or uploaded in the course of managing the platform is not considered personal data and will be retained. This includes:
dataRetentionText.2: This content forms part of the platform infrastructure and is essential for maintaining the integrity and continuity of the SuperWise system. It is therefore not deleted when an Admin account is removed.

admin.generalInfoText: This clause applies specifically to users with admin-level access on SuperWise.

generic.generalInfoText: At SuperWise, we take your privacy and the protection of your personal data seriously. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and manage your information to ensure transparency and your peace of mind.

student&supervisor.changesAndOverwritesText: When you update your personal data, such as your name, profile picture, topic description, or bio, the previous version is permanently overwritten. We do not retain copies or backups of your previous personal data.
student&supervisor.collectedDataList:
Email address (used for login and communication)
First and last name
Profile picture
Messages sent within the platform
Topic description (students)
Bio (supervisors)
Tags selected to describe expertise or thesis topics
Match history: supervisors you have matched with or dismissed
Requests sent: including chat and supervision requests
student&supervisor.collectedDataText: To provide our matchmaking and supervision services, we collect and store the following information:
student&supervisor.dataDeletionList:
Your email
Records of matches
Messages sent to or received from others

dataDeletionText.1: You have the right to request the deletion of your data at any time. When you do your profile and personal information will no longer be visible or accessible to other users. Some minimal data may be retained until the end of the supervision period, for functionality and record purposes. This includes:
dataDeletionText.2: After the supervision period ends, this remaining data will be fully and irreversibly deleted.

generic.noVideoSupport: Your browser does not support HTML video... i think its time to upgrade your device!

landing.dataCollection: In order to find the perfect supervisor for you, we have to collect and process some data. Find out {0} what we do with it!

matching.acceptRequestDescription: Would you like to accept the supervision request from {firstName} {lastName}? Once accepted You will officially be a supervisor-student pair

existingSupervision.headline: Congratulations, You already have a supervisor!

matching.noSupervisors: There are no (more) supervisors that fit your tags...
matching.rejectRequestDescription: Are you sure you want to reject the supervision request sent by {firstName} {lastName}
matching.supervisionRequest: {name} wants to be supervised by you!

swipeLeft.description: By dismissing {firstName} {lastName}, they will never get suggested again, but you can still search for them. Are you sure you want to do this?
swipeLeft.headline: Dismiss Supervisor
swipeLeft.warning: Dismissed supervisors can still be found in the search

modal.supervisionInfo: When you send a thesis supervision request, it will be forwarded to the selected supervisors. They can then decide whether to accept or decline the request. If they accept the request, a confirmation will be created that you can download.
modal.withdrawSupervisionDescription: Would you like to withdraw the supervision request from {name}? Once withdrawn, the supervisor will no longer see this request.

description.name: Your name is visible to everyone you send requests to. This can be changed on the profile later on.

priority.student: These tags are used to find suitable supervisors for you. The priority can be changed on the profile later!
priority.supervisor: The priority of these tags should relfect your expertece on the topic. They can be changed at any point on your profile.

tag.student: These tags are used to find suitable supervisors for you. They can be changed at any point on your profile!
tag.supervisor: These tags are used for students to match with you. They can be changed at any point on your profile.
